projects.name: Skforecast
projects.description: Skforecast is a Python library for time series forecasting using machine learning models. It works with any regressor compatible with the scikit-learn API, including popular options like LightGBM, XGBoost, CatBoost, Keras, and many others. It aims to make state-of-the-art forecasting accessible through simple, unified, and production-ready tools.
